short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bearworks enables people to sell together, anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bearworks enables people to sell together, from anywhere. This is a package with more limited permissions for people who cannot use the main one for security reasons.
